title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, there are N redraws of the entire client area, resulting in inefficient redraws.
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, there are N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, there should be only one redraw for the entire client area, regardless of the number of lines appended.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Create a StyledText widget with word wrap mode enabled.
2. Append N lines to the StyledText widget.
3. Observe the redraws occurring for the entire client area.
Expected Result: There should be only one redraw for the entire client area, regardless of the number of lines appended. You can add the following line of code to StyledText.performPaint method to see the redraws occurring: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
